subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Oakland’s Brett Lawrie homered off Dellin Betances to start the 10th inning, and Tyler Clippard struck out Mark Teixeira with runners on first and second base to preserve the Athletics’ win.
snippet: Oakland’s Brett Lawrie homered off Dellin Betances to start the 10th inning, and Tyler Clippard struck out Mark Teixeira with runners on first and second base to preserve the Athletics’ win.
